channel.title: Mullvad vpn is not working on Windows XP guest machine: what is whonix vpn port?
channel.description:
Hi,
I'm a long time user of whonix. I simply love it and I hope to still use it for a long time.
I've tried Mullvad vpn just yesterday. But I don't know why I can't connect with it. Maybe I need to know what Port on whonix gateway I have to use.
I'm using mullvad in a Windows XP guest machine for a few tests but is trying to connect and fails everytime. I simply installed they're client of course. And I have a 30 days plan so it's not a problem with them I think.
This are the default options. Maybe you know how I have to change them.
Thank you for your great work. Long live to whonix!
[DEFAULT] port = any hard_dns = False protocol = any location = xx disable_ipv6 = True obfsproxy = auto server = any delete_default_route = False exclude_swedish = False
[Client] delete_default_route = False exclude_swedish = False location = nl protocol = any server = any port = any id = XXXX hard_dns = False

item.title: Mullvad vpn is not working on Windows XP guest machine: what is whonix vpn port?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Saw Whonix’s documentation on that topic already? See:

Whonix – 19 Apr 20

Features and Advantages

Whonix ™ Feature List


Maybe it helps.

Also you’ll need TCP, because the Tor network does not support UDP. And probably you’re better off using OpenVPN command line rather than proprietary VPN clients.

Read full topic
item.source: Mullvad vpn is not working on Windows XP guest machine: what is whonix vpn port?

item.title: Mullvad vpn is not working on Windows XP guest machine: what is whonix vpn port?
item.dc:creator: Hijeck
item.description:
Hi,

I’m a long time user of whonix. I simply love it and I hope to still use it for a long time.

I’ve tried Mullvad vpn just yesterday. But I don’t know why I can’t connect with it. Maybe I need to know what Port on whonix gateway I have to use.

I’m using mullvad in a Windows XP guest machine for a few tests but is trying to connect and fails everytime.
I simply installed they’re client of course. And I have a 30 days plan so it’s not a problem with them I think.

This are the default options. Maybe you know how I have to change them.

Thank you for your great work. Long live to whonix!

[DEFAULT]
port = any
hard_dns = False
protocol = any
location = xx
disable_ipv6 = True
obfsproxy = auto
server = any
delete_default_route = False
exclude_swedish = False

[Client]
delete_default_route = False
exclude_swedish = False
location = nl
protocol = any
server = any
port = any
id = XXXX
hard_dns = False

Read full topic
item.source: Mullvad vpn is not working on Windows XP guest machine: what is whonix vpn port?
